document.full_text: goodyear tire & rubber co  reported a profit that was more than four times what wall street expected, with strength in its home north american market pushing quarterly sales to an all-time high, and its shares jumped more than 10 percent.
document.title: goodyear shares soar as profit beats street
lines_and_colors: goodyear tire & rubber co  reported a profit that was more than four times what wall street expected, with strength in its home north american market pushing quarterly sales to an all-time high, and its shares jumped more than 10 percent.
